NewBlogUser.title: Add new user to the blog

NewBlogPost.title: Add New Blog Post
NewBlogPost.success: Post successfully added to the blog

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.subtitle: The page you are looking for does not exist.

VerifyEmailPage.title: Verify your email
VerifyEmailPage.subtitle: An email with a magic link has been sent to your inbox. Click the link to access your account quickly! (If you don't find it, check your spam.)

AuthErrorPage.title: Authentication error
AuthErrorPage.subtitle: We were unable to authenticate your account. Please try again later.

UsersPage.title: Manage Users
UsersPage.description: Manage blog users, control permissions, and add new users.
UsersPage.remove_user_description: Deleting this user will remove all posts from this user from the blog. This action is irreversible.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage blog settings and personalize the content.
SettingsPage.delete_blog_description: Upon deleting the blog, it will no longer be available to you or other users, and the posts will no longer be accessible.

PostsPage.title: Manage Posts
PostsPage.description: Manage blog posts, edit, delete, and add new posts.
PostsPage.remove_post_description: Deleting this post will remove it from the blog. This action is irreversible.

Errors.auth/ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXISTS: Email already associated with an account
Errors.blog/SLUG_ALREADY_EXISTS: Slug already in use by another blog
Errors.blog/USER_ALREADY_IN_BLOG: Email of user already associated with a blog
Errors.post/SLUG_ALREADY_EXISTS: Slug already in use by another post
